name: Covert Cosmos
description: You play as a smuggler, set to collect rare gems and metals from a private mining company. The people you work for are not happy with your recent performances and are threatening to kill you if you don't succeed, or worse, flee! Your goal is to sneak past the rival miner's security, get what you can, and get out without being detected or killed. The game combines zero gravity controls with stealth based game play for an exciting challenge.
